name: One Rolly Boi
description:
A Snow man that's lost his head. Help him get back to normal by rolling and throwing him across multiple levels.

This was a game jam game made for the Southampton Solent university Winter game jam. where the theme was winter and the Threat from the game was meant to be environmental.

This was worked on by Samuel Wilson, Daniel Foyle, Byron Andrews-Salvietto

Roll and jump your way past many traps like water, wind, mines and Icicle's. Whilst using an array of power ups to blow up and stick your way through many levels.

collect the coins hidden in the level and get to the end in the fastest time you can to try and complete each level to 100%.

most importantly Have Fun!
